subject: Hi
body:
Hi
I am a Canadian female geologist dealing in crude oil and precious
stones business in the Middle East. I have an urgent welfare mission
project that will require your personal involvement if you oblige.We
shall discuss details upon your response.
Dr.Thana Burhan
(Manama Bahrain)
Tel/WhatsApp: +97337079207
Relp to  Email: 
thanaburhan7@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Hi
body:
Hello Burhan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested to hear more about your welfare mission project. Could you please provide me with some details? What exactly is the project about and how can I be of assistance?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Hi
body:
Thanks for your candid response and I do appreciate you as a person and
what you represent to humanity. I could not revert to you before now
because the medical procedure took too long and I went to sleep immediately
as a result of the effects of the administered drugs. My dear friend, a few
months ago I fell very sick and was diagnosed with Esophageal cancer at
 Royal Specialist hospital here in Manama, where I am making this contact
with you now. I am in deep pain as I write you this mail, but I am
determined more than ever  to make sure that this charity project becomes a
reality before I pass away.

 I have been recommended for surgical operation at Tisch Cancer Specialist
Hospital New York in the United States of America but I am hesitant to
leave for  now because the doctor's verdict on the success of the procedure
is 50/50.  My medical condition has become desperate and hopeless with each
passing day over the past months and I must embark on this trip as a matter
of emergency if there are no other options beyond  what they have available
here , including trado medical approach. We will have the chance to meet in
Newyork when I eventually arrive  at  Tisch Cancer Specialist Hospital
within two weeks from now if there is no improvement in my condition here.

Like I hinted earlier, I have some amounts of funds which are part of the
divorce settlement  from my late husband and  private earnings from the
gold/diamond business which I run on a large scale. The capital investment
money is in  excess of  ($3.5m) with Cofina Bank Groupe (
https://cofinagroupes.com) out of which is drawn a Master Card that will be
sent to you  on my instructions after due legal documentation and
endorsement between us to start off the basic establishments for the
charity project.  I will provide you with more details and introduce you
personally to the relevant authorities as my appointed trustee in due
course.

 We will discuss necessary details and if you have interest also in selling
gold, I will introduce you to my agent in Eco Trust Company (
https://ecotrustsec.com) to discuss the shipment and sale  of my gold
deposit worth 125kg with all necessary documents available, including
customs declaration and approval for export. You will not be required to
spend your money in the process because that is why I have made the
provision for the Master Card to be sent to you, in order to enable you
access the fund to a daily limited  amount through ATM before opening a
suitable account with the Holden bank Confina to facilitate the transfer of
the money for the project needs in due course.

I need a copy of your identity and your registered  address  for the
charity administration documentation. . The information will be used to
process legal trustee documents in the court of Bahrain  to empower you for
the appointment and service as soon as possible. I attach  some of the
relevant documents for your records and reference in making formal enquiry
with the respective institutions if you so desire. You can inquire through
: https://ecotrustsec.com/
https://cofinagroupes.com/
Regards,

Dr.Thana Burhan
Bldg 178, Flat 104, Road 907, 309
P.O. Box 10988
Manama Bahrain

subject: Re: Hi
body:
Dear Burhan,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition, and I hope you are receiving the necessary medical care. It's admirable that you are determined to make your charity project a reality.

I would be interested in learning more about the charity project you mentioned. Could you provide some details about the specific cause or purpose of the project? Additionally, how do you plan on ensuring the funds are used effectively for this cause?

Regarding the gold business, I'm curious to know more about it. How does it work, and what role would I play if I were to get involved? Are there any risks or legal considerations that I should be aware of?

Lastly, before proceeding further, could you please clarify how my identity and registered address will be used for the charity? What kind of legal trustee documents are required, and what responsibilities would come with being appointed as a trustee?

Thank you for providing some relevant documents for reference. I will review them carefully and let you know if I have any further questions.

Best wishes,
James
